sentences.cn: 博克曼口齿不清地表示祝贺。
祝贺你写出这么有意思的文章。
大家纷纷向那封新婚夫妇道贺.

sentences.en: Congratulations, you have a healthy baby boy.
sentences.cn: 恭喜，你生了个健康的男孩。

sentences.en: I said congratulations and walked over to him and shook his hand.
sentences.cn: 我向他表示祝贺，并走过去和他握手。

sentences.en: I send you my warmest congratulations on your success.
sentences.cn: 我对你的成功致以最热烈的祝贺.

sentences.en: It's great to have you back. Congratulations are surely in order!
sentences.cn: 你回来真是太好了，就等着向你道贺呢！

sentences.en: People crowded round the player with congratulations.
sentences.cn: 人们簇拥着那个运动员向他祝贺.

sentences.en: Permit me to offer you my sincere congratulations.
Please give her my congratulations when you see her.
sentences.cn: 见到她时请转达我的祝贺.

sentences.en: She accepted their congratulations with becoming modesty.
sentences.cn: 她不卑不亢地接受了他们的祝贺.

sentences.en: The club also offers its congratulations to D. Brown on her appointment as president.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部还就布朗被任命为会长一事向她表示了祝贺。

sentences.en: You've passed your driving test? Congratulations!
sentences.cn: 你驾驶测验合格了? 恭喜!

trans.tran_en: If you offer someone your congratulations, you congratulate them on something nice that has happened to them or on something good that they have done
